step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position with your arm extended overhead. Keep that arm straight and feel the stretch.
Excellent! Your palm and fingers are open wide. This is a great start to promoting lymph flow.
Nicely done making a fist while inhaling and tightening your muscles. Keep up the good work!
Perfect! You opened your hand while exhaling and relaxing. Visualize that fluid moving.
Great continuation! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance as you begin the second rep.
Excellent open hand and wide fingers. You're effectively preparing for the pumping action.
Well done on making a fist and tightening your muscles during inhalation for this rep.
Fantastic! You exhaled and relaxed your hand perfectly. Keep visualizing the lymph flow.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance. Continue to open your hand wide and make a fist while inhaling, then relax while exhaling. Keep up the good work promoting lymph flow!
